column5: I really hope that y'all have a super day. We can thank our lucky stars that we're in reasonable health.....not everyone is.  Be well.
....Good morning Roy. I'll be working today so the smiles are somewhat limited.
What's up, Roy?
Mornin' Roy, or in my case goodnight. (I'm done here at 6am, headed home to sleep)
Everything's great here. Just another day to be thankful for what we have. Have a good rest Mike.
Right back at ya Roy...
Good morning all!!!
Thanks Roy and a 'tip of the hat' to all of you on this fine summer (maybe rainy) day!!
morning all!  back to work for me as well but hey its a short week!  Cheers!
Good morning.  It would have been a beauty on the water.
Good Morning  As a friend of mine used to say, "rain or shine, work or rest, any day your vertical is best"
Roy, I am coming out of my self-imposed exile to respond to your wonderful message. Good morning to you, and continued good health to all. Regards, Jim

Good morning OFC - another great day coming up - getting packed for a week at Club Trout Lake in NW Quebec - a remote location with 5 other oldtimers that offers up a bit of walleye, northern and laker action - leave Friday, return the following Saturday - do the laundry and head out Monday the 18th for a week at Nemio on the Gouin.  I am so thankful that health is not an issue and every day is still an exciting learning experience.
Good morning to all too. Have a great day.
Thanks Roy, and I hope you too have a super day.  JF
Thanks Roy, just made my day  Hope you will have a  good one as well...
Thanks Roy, just made my day  Hope you will have a  good one as well...
Good Morning Sweetie!!!  You have a wonderful day also.  Joey
My cats breath smells like cat food.              Morning guys!
Morning Roy!  Hope all is well in your neck of the woods.  All is great here
Bonjour Roy et bonne journée à toi aussi Leechman
